content:
Is this the process for getting a new profile approved?
1. Complete a PSS for work group FHIR work, if there isn't one.
2. Complete the profile profile at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Template:FHIR_Profile_Proposal and e-mail to fmgcontact@hl7.org to initiate the consideration process

BR&R has a a Lab Data use case that will probably have 1 new profile with extensions to several resources. Thx.
Yup, that's the process. I presume this will be coordinated with/co-sponsored by OO?
Yessir, we will coordinate with OO. Thx.
